backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of Bylaw - 363-365 Yonge Street

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 797-2019 to designate 363-365 Yonge Street (Toronto Centre, Ward 13) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.
